event.title: 2015, over 116 square kilometres (45 sq mi), while the urban area counts

data.event: The city itself has a population of about 326,799, as of 2015, over 116 square kilometres (45 sq mi), while the urban area counts 653,028 inhabitants over 203 square kilometres (78 sq mi).

event.title: built for Frederick II, which is now

data.event: To the north is the closely built old town on the peninsula between two modern harbours, with the Basilica of Saint Nicholas, the Cathedral of San Sabino (1035â€“1171) and the Hohenstaufen Castle built for Frederick II, which is now also a major nightlife district.
